question: Explanation of a dream.
answer:
QUESTION
As Salamaleykum Mufti Saheb, About 2 months ago, I had a dream that I was in a Masjid in the woman?s section, where a prayer is going on. All the women were praying, while I was at the end sitting with a Quran and following what the Imam saab who was reciting the prayer. I don?t know why, I wasn?t praying. So anyhow, when the Imam came to a Rukuh, the ladies thought it was time for Sajda, but since I was following the imam through the Quran, I knew he had just paused, and the Surah hadn?t finished. Therefore, when the women bent down, I told them to stand up, since the imam has just paused, and it wasn?t Sijda. After all the women were finished praying, I then saw myself praying at the end. Could u please, tell me how this dream specifically relates to me. And also, I love reading the Quran everyday, by English translation, it gives me the strength to live life, by Allah(SWT?s) order. Thankyou very much, brother.
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is a reflection of your love to recite the Quran and understand
its contents. May Allah increase the love of the Quran in our hearts and
grant us understanding of the Quran.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
